So I'm thinking that it must be bad sound files.

For those who hadn't used the fix BEFORE installing the game :

extract zip.exe (the fixed one), data2.zip and make a bat file with these 2 lines :

zip.exe x -y data2.zip >nul
del /F /Q data2.zip >nul

So you don't need to reinstall all the game. ;-)

I figured out how to fix the static sound. Open the console ingame, and type "snd_rebuildaudiocache" without the quotations. It will minimize the game and open a window that rebuilds the sound files. This fixed the static bursts for me and now the game is running perfectly. Thanks for a great upload!!!

I have installed it (stayed at 25% for like 5 hours but finally finished). 

All is working good but during gameplay I frequently run into an invisible barrier/wall. I try to strafe left or right to get past it but I can't. The only way that I have found to move forward is to turn around and walk backwards for a few steps, then I can turn back around and proceed. This happens alot, like every 50 feet. Any suggestions? ANybody else having this issue?

Figured out the invisible wall issue. It happened after I reconfiged the keyboard (I like to have all my controls on the num keypad). After I reset it back to default it worked much better. It still happens but not so often and when it does it just double tap the move forward key and I get unstuck.
Very nice Blaze.  Re-compiling of the data went very fast, only sat on 25% for about 10 minutes.  Thanks a lot!
